resource_explanation: API to handel Post resource. Authorization required .
explanation: Admin can delete any post. "user" type users can only delete their own posts. Guests cannot delete any post.

requests.curl:
curl "http://localhost:3000/posts/4" -d '' -X DELETE \
	-H "Accept: application/json" \
	-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
	-H "Authorization: WC5tEi4MVNWjoSx6yFkQsUH5" \
	-H "Host: example.org" \
	-H "Cookie: "
